payment.payerName: Payer's registered legal name - if paymentPayer1 = 0
payment.payerAddress: Payer's address - street name, house number, postal code and city - if paymentPayer1 = 0
payment.payerCountryReg: Payer's country of registration - if paymentPayer1 = 0
payment.payerTaxN: Payer's tax registration number - if paymentPayer1 = 0
